column5: Representative organization from national meteorological services ( official national names , links point to names for official use in English )
Ufficio Generale Spazio Aereo e Meteorologia ( USAM ) - Reparto Meteorologia
Agencia Estatal de Meteorología ( AEMET ) , Ministerio de Agricultura , Alimentación y Medio Ambiente
Institut Royal Météorologique de Belgique ( IRM ) / Koninklijk Meteorologisch Instituut van België ( KMI )
Sveriges meteorologiska och hydrologiska institut ( SMHI )
Remote Sensing Division , Devlet Meteoroloji İşleri Genel Müdürlüğü ( DMİGM )
Zentralanstalt für Meteorologie und Geodynamik ( ZAMG )
Instytut Meteorologii i Gospodarki Wodnej ( IMGW )
Český hydrometeorologický ústav ( CHMI ) , Družicové Oddělení
